


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->

# ```js isChrome ```


Detect if is chrome

## Parameters

- **ua** (navigator.userAgent) String: The user agent on which to make the test



## Example (js)

```js
import isChrome from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/chrome'
if (isChrome()) {
  // do something cool
}
```
